properties.areaDesc: Pueblo Vicinity/Pueblo County Below 6300 Feet; Canon City Vicinity/Eastern Fremont County
properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 10 at 5:50AM MST until February 11 at 12:00PM MST by NWS Pueblo CO
properties.description:
* WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 8
inches. the heaviest snow will fall over southern and western
Pueblo county. The city of Pueblo should see 2 to 4 inches of
snow.

* WHERE...Eastern Fremont county and Pueblo county below 6300
feet.

* WHEN...From 5 PM this afternoon to noon MST Tuesday.

* IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous
conditions could impact the morning or evening commute.
properties.instruction:
Slow down and use caution while traveling.

The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can
be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 5 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO NOON MST TUESDAY
